website_summaries.verdict: PowerDirector offers the best response and rendering speed of consumer video editing software we've tested. The app includes nearly every video effect and output option you could ask for. And this latest version also adds a capable sound editor.
pros: Up to 100 simultaneous video and audio tracks
Advanced editing features such as keyframes and time-codes
Uses graphics card acceleration and multiple CPUs

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Video Editing Software from Cyberlink.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Cyberlink products for around three years now, and bought this recent edition to continue my hobby of Photos and Videos DVDs. So far, so good, the software is working well, hardly any crashes or stuttering. Easy access to the website as well for updates and downloads of extras such as titles, effects etc. I already had Director 15 but did not delete this programme from Hard Drive, instead have both programmes running together although not using them both at the same time of course! Very good value too for what you get. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Redfearn

customer_reviews.title: Cyberlink Power Director 16 ~ Very Happy So Far.
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a couple of weeks and I'm really only using the basic editing to allow me to post JPEG-4 on-line and sending short videos via WhatsApp. Being a bit of a novice I have found Cyberlink Power Director 16 very easy to learn the basics and getting good results. I will spend more time learning with some tips I've found on YouTube before playing with all the many extras that come with it. So far I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve N London

customer_reviews.title: great and worth purchasing,
customer_reviews.text: everything works fine, and everything is all that I need for home type films I have tried at least 7 different makes of movie making software including very expensive ones . some are very good but take twice as long to do a job than power director for the exact same result , so well done to p w if I was to change anything I would have put in a few garbage type mattes 16 point etc into the mattes room . thanks for a good bit of software ,
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Had an old Serif movie editing software, but with the purchase of a drone, thought I'd update to something newer. Really disappointed with how laggy this is on my machine, which isn't old. Only trying to work on the very simplest of editing jobs, just cropping clips and adjusting speed perhaps. Nothing fancy. Stalls while working on clips, preview is choppy and every now and again it corrupts a clip and loses your editing efforts. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JJABBOT

customer_reviews.title: Crashes my PC
customer_reviews.text: The features look pretty good, but the bonus content was quite poor. I'd make pretty good use of it if it didn't crash my Windows 10 PC. Every time I start it running, within a couple of minutes I get a BSOD (Blue Screen Of Death). I've passed my returns window, so I am feeling robbed to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: The audio playback only intermittently works. When I tried burning an AVCHD disk it freezes partway through playing in a Bluray player. I wasted several disks trying to solve this. No response from their customer support after 48 hours hence I have uninstalled it and sent back for a refund. Will go back to using the basic software that came with my camcorder that never suffered from these problems
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: ... while I had it on computer was it very good but I was unable to Activate it and advice ...
customer_reviews.text: The Impression I had while I had it on computer was it very good but I was unable to Activate it and advice given by CyberLink was helpful but still unable to activate so I have given 3 stars though would have given more had I activated within 30 day period
customer_reviews.author: Les R-R

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from PD10
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that my Power Director 10 stopped converting mod files, so had to upgrade to 16. That being said, it's a handy piece of kit. Would like to see some different templates though
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.text: Never used before,always used pinnacle.l am only editing footage from a camcorder,but the first2 l have done with cyberlink were so easy that anyone can make their own movie.
